entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 31. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries late this morning and this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 31. Wind chill minus 50 this morning and minus 43 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 36.
